title: Antoine Griezmann's release clause revealed: Man United and Chelsea set for summer battle
text:
Antoine Griezmann's release clause revealed: Man United and Chelsea set for summer battle ANTOINE GRIEZMANN’S release clause has been revealed by reports in Spain. PUBLISHED: 14:35, Tue, Jan 24, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:44, Tue, Jan 24, 2017 
The Atletico Madrid star is on Manchester United and Chelsea ’s radars for the coming summer. 
United are ready to break the transfer record in consecutive summers and are prepared to pay around £100million to get Griezmann to Old Trafford. 
But Antonio Conte , with Diego Costa set to leave, will also be in the running. GETTY Antoine Griezmann is on Manchester United and Chelsea's radars GETTY Antoine Griezmann has scored eight goals in La Liga this season 
And now it has emerged, via Spanish publication okdiario.com , the France international has a £95m (€110m) release clause in his Atletico contract. 
However the 25-year-old is also wanted by Real Madrid - meaning a bidding war could still go ahead between the three clubs. 
Griezmann is the hottest property in Europe after starring for Diego Simeone’s side and for France at Euro 2016. 
He was top scorer as France fell at the final hurdle and he has 14 goals this season. GETTY Antoine Griezmann has a £95m release clause at Atletico Madrid How Man United could look with Antoine Griezmann Sun, October 16, 2016
